name: @abuelwiss/angularx-social-login
description: Social login and authentication module for Angular 19. Supports authentication with Google, Facebook, Amazon, and VK. Can be extended to other providers also. THis package is forked and upgraded from @abacritt/angularx-social-login
author: Jaibatrik Dutta <jaibatrik@gmail.com> | Wissam AbuAbbara <wissamabbara@gmail.com>
